Scripts.OnLoad: local dalport = GetSpellInfo(53142) if (dalport ~= nil) then self:SetAttribute("type1", "spell") self:SetAttribute("spell", dalport) end
local shatport = GetSpellInfo(35717) if (shatport ~= nil) then self:SetAttribute("type1", "spell") self:SetAttribute("spell", shatport) end
